Blacknightmare::


After she set and lock down at the intruder (Silverscout) in a cr. 
Blacknightmare went where Bullet, Crater, Kitkat2 and Blaze were "we 
have to find out how this pest come in... " said the femme "and 
avoid that other do the same"

She opened her comm  link towards the main computer "Computer lock 
down all the ship, and turn on the lava defences"


Soon all things were done.

"Now nobdy can come in or leave the base" said the femme "How're you 
Kitkat, are you hurt?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Crater::
>

ends. 
> He frowns, not sure to do now.

> Blacknightmare left her. The Predacon closed cr's door and while 
the 
> cr repaired the intruder the same cr, erased every previuos memory 
and 
> reprogramed the bot. Every memory, was downloaded to Darkfate 
private 
> files, where nobody over Darkfate could read them. ervice.
